data.title: Pentair presents its products and innovations at Piscine Global Europe
data.meta_description: Pentair wishes to mark its presence at the 2022 edition of the Piscine Global Europe show with a stand of more than 280 m2, where the many products and innovations that will equip the swimming pools of tomorrow will be unveiled exclusively.
data.text:
Pentair wishes to mark its presence at the 2022 edition of the Piscine Global Europe show with a stand of more than 280 m2, where the many products and innovations that will equip the swimming pools of tomorrow will be unveiled exclusively.

Pentair unveils tomorrow's pool products at the Piscine Global Europe 2022 tradeshow

After two years of pandemic, the global economic background has changed a lot: manufacturers and all professionals in the swimming pool sector must adapt without delay to a market that requires more eco-friendly, durable and economical products, in line with the requirements of our era.

With its concept of a virtuous swimming pool that has existed for several years, Pentair is a trailblazer when it comes to economical and durable swimming pools: its latest variable speed pumps, cartridge filters or heat pumps, for example, were designed using this strict framework, to support swimming pool owners in their daily efforts.

The Pentair products at the trade fair

At its stand at Piscine Global Europe 2022, around thirty products will be presented, including a selection of variable speed and flow pumps, filters, home-automated solutions, heat pumps and many more. A perfect opportunity to demonstrate how these products have developed and become even more virtuous and efficient. Especially thanks to:

more independent and intelligent solutions that systematically use the right quantity of energy and products.

better-connected solutions to make life easier for professionals and their customers, such as the new IntelliFlo3 VSF, the world's first connected variable speed pump.

New IntelliFlo3 VSF

a complete and growing range, such as its family of robotic cleaners, the Prowler

Prowler P10 pool robot

In its ambition to provide better support to swimming pool professionals, Pentair wishes to help them renovate or create swimming pools with more added value, equipped with durable, innovative and intelligent products, which make life easier for their customers.
